Simon Cowell claims that allowing the crowd to react in real time will help him avoid overlooking another big star. There have been many, many times on these shows where I've hated somebody and practically had a mutiny going on behind me, he said.`` I don't believe Susan Boyle would have gone through in the old-fashioned audition method.'' Exactly which judges would be deliberating on the future Susan Boyles of America, he wouldn't say,
